Five Cooking Functions - Choose from Air Fry Bake Broil Toast and Keep Warm

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features Air Fry Technology Deep fried taste without the fat! This innovative cooking method surrounds food with high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite fried foods using little to no oil. EvenToast Technology More even toasting with the unique heat diffuser design. It evenly distributes heat and infrared energy throughout the oven to optimize even toasting. Five Cooking Functions Choose from Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Toast, and Keep Warm. Cooking Capacity This countertop toaster oven fits a 9” pizza, four slices of bread, or a variety of other snacks and meals.

BLACK+DECKER Crisp ‘N Bake Air Fry 4-Slice Toaster Oven Deep fried taste without the fat! This oven features Air Fry Technology, which uses high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite fried foods with little to no oil. Two control knobs simplify cooking, letting you set the 30-minute timer and choose from five cooking functions: Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Toast, and Keep Warm. On the toasting function, EvenToast Technology evenly distributes heat and infrared energy to optimize even toasting. The interior is large enough to fit up to four slices of bread or a 9” pizza, and it’s great for fresh or frozen snacks. Innovative features and reliable performance help make BLACK+DECKER the #1 brand in toaster ovens*. *#1 Brand in Toaster Ovens in the USA—Source: NPD POS, unit sales, 12mo. Ending February 2019

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had an air fryer/toaster oven combo and replaced it with this air fryer. I love it! It is simple to use, has easy to use presets, and will do about everything my combo did. It's so easy to clean and does a beautiful job cooking and browning. I would definitely recommend this air fryer.

reviews.reviewText: I chose this model because the dials can turn with ease. As a toaster, it's exactly what I need and includes an Air Fry option. The size is manageable for my counter. The more expensive brands do not do a better job than this model. A bargain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but dials are annoying
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a replacement for my old B&D toaster oven - which I had for over 25 years. Hopefully, this one will last that long too. The old toaster over had one lever for toasting. Press it down and it toasts for a few minutes, then turns off. With the new one, you first have to turn one dial to "toast", then turn another dial past "10" (much longer than needed for toasting bread, bagels, etc.) to activate the timer. You then have to adjust the time so the items won't burn, or watch it to ensure burning doesn't occur - all while listening to an annoying ticking sound which is constant until the toasting is finished. There's a bell that "dings" when the toasting is done. It's kinda loud - not sure if I like that, but I guess some will find it useful.The tray in the old toaster oven had a handle like protrusion on one side. The new tray, although larger, does not. This makes it harder to grasp the tray using an oven mitt or kitchen towel, without touching the food.These gripes aside, it works well. I'd probably choose something else in the future though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: I have a similar toaster oven that I use at home (another brand) but I wanted a new one for an upcoming road trip. This is the only one on amazon that could be delivered overnight! Easy to use and glad it worked, as I just took it, box and all, on the trip. It is used when traveling, mainly to heat up already cooked food but I have since actually cooked food as well. Didn't realize it was also an air-fryer. Haven't tried that function yet. Overall, perfect size, good value. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
